question:

To what extent do you agree or disagree with this argument.

In this essay, I will argue about this field and I'm going to elaborate on my opinion about that.

Firstly, our nation has been faced with a lack of flora by uncontrol cultivation, and governments enforce rules to control thats, which caused, a lot of broadcasts and newspaper institutions to change their way, and publish their news in  other ways. secondly, due to coining properties by generation, they don't have enough time to read heavy articles and magazines, and prefer to understand and notice headlines.

On the other hand, as I mentioned  the first our planet has been changed, and mankind doesn't prefer to save their money and time they prefer to read the news in any place and situations that they can, such as, on  way to work or at bathrooms or at their beds.
in conclusion, I strongly believe, that verbal newspapers will be renovated by virtual broadcast institutions. because freedom and convenience are two basic needs of our generations.
